thread.section_title: iPhoneIMEI.Net Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iPhoneIMEI.Net | iphoneimei.net | 5 of 84
thread.title: Alex

author: Alex
title: Alex
text: I turned to iPhoneIMEI after unsuccessfully calling ATT several times to unlock a ATT go phone which was fully paid for, but according to ATT policies won't get unlocked unless it's used for 6 months. Entering the required IMEI number and paying was easy enough, but then I did not hear back from iPhoneIMEI for ~ 3 days, at which point I got an email confirming that they were still working on it. It wasn't until day 4 confirmed that I got the email that the phone was unlocked and was able to insert the new sim card without a hitch. Overall it was a smooth enough process, I just wish iPhoneIMEI kept me more updated throughout the process and I had started the process earlier had I know how long it would take.
